meanings.definition: A person to whom goods are entrusted for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The bailees were responsible for delivering the packages safely.
meanings.sent2: The bailees carefully handled the valuable items.
meanings.sent3: The bailees joked about having a secret treasure hunt with the entrusted goods.
meanings.sent4: The bailees were like guardians of the precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The bailees were like the protectors of the special delivery.

meanings.definition: A person who receives personal property in trust.
meanings.sent1: The bailees were happy to receive the personal belongings for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: The bailees ensured the safekeeping of the entrusted possessions.
meanings.sent3: The bailees pretended to have a secret club for the received items.
meanings.sent4: The bailees were like the keepers of the entrusted treasures.
meanings.sent5: The bailees were like the guardians of the personal property.
